ctNode Struct Reference

#include <ctNode.h>


Data Fields

size_t i

Detailed Description

Nodes of the contour tree.

This is a critical point in the contour tree. Together with ctArc, this forms the contour tree data structure. Nodes serve as connection points for arcs. You can store information in their data field, but you probably want to pay more attention to the arcs

Field Documentation

ctBranchList children

void* data

User data

struct ctArc* down [read]

Doubly-linked, null-terminated list of arcs extended upwards from this node. Iterate like this:

for (ctArc * a = node->down; a != NULL; a = a->nextDown )...

size_t i

Critical vertex that this node represents.

struct ctArc* up [read]

Doubly-linked, null-terminated list of arcs extended upwards from this node. Iterate like this:

for (ctArc * a = node->up; a != NULL; a = a->nextUp )...
